items.name: var creator: OSType
items.desc: The synthesizer that is required to use the voice. This is equivalent to the value contained in the synthManufacturer field of a speech version information structure and that contained in the synthCreator field of a speech extension data structure. The set of OSType values specified entirely by space characters and lowercase letters is reserved.

items.name: var id: OSType
items.desc: The voice ID of the voice for the synthesizer. Every voice on a synthesizer has a unique ID.
